amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to reduce funding for Consumer Product Safety Commission to FY 2019 level.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Consumer Product Safety Commission to FY2019 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 246 (Roll no. 627).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 246 (Roll no. 627).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
